title: Baked tandoori chicken tikka
ingredients: ['7 boneless chicken breast halves', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '2 (125g) pots natural yoghurt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, cubed', '1 red pepper, seeds removed and cubed', 'skewers']
